title: Which one is correct, 'From which we get' or 'from which we gets'? - Quora

response.answer_text: ‘From which we get’ is the correct one. When possible, if you isolate the phrase or change the order, the correct way often becomes obvious. For example, chances are you already knew “We gets it from…” is incorrect and “We get it from…” is correct. This is not a “by the book” thing, but it’s a tip that might come in handy.
‘From which we get’ is the correct one. I get, you get, he/she/it gets We get, you get, they get Gemma Calimeri
